p: Twenty-eight dpi the remaining five mock-vaccinated calves in Group 1 (D2-1 to D2-5) and the five calves inoculated with the LSD-RVF.mf construct in Group 2 (C2-1 to C2-5) were challenged intravenously with the virulent RVFV M35/74 strain at a titer of 3.0 Ã— 10 6 TCID 50/ml in 1.0 ml ( Table 1).
